parameters.text:
Look at the attached medical document (German doctor's note). OCR the text with 100% accuracy. Extract the following into a JSON format:

Diagnosis (include ICD-10-GM codes if present, e.g. G43.0; preserve codes exactly)

Medications (Name, Dosage, Frequency)

Warning Signs (include OPS or other procedure codes if present)

Return ONLY raw JSON. No conversational filler. Do not include patient name, address, or other identifiers.
